title: Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, And Sunny Leone Recreate Iconic "Deewar" Dialogue
text:
facebook 206 SHARES 
Salman Khan and Shah Rukh Khan coming together for the second time on Bigg Boss had us glued to our T.V. screens. The duo did everything, from giving the BB contestants secret tasks, to making then recreate iconic SRK poses (the arms wide open, singing a romantic song). One of the best moments from the show was when actress Sunny Leone, who has an item number (and also some part in the film Raees , rumours suggest) made the two superstars recreate the iconic " Mere Paas Maa hai " scene from Deewar . 
The actress, who has grooved to the tunes of Lailaa O Lailaa in Raees , got Salman to re-enact Shashi Kapoor, Shah Rukh was Amitabh Bachchan, and Sunny herself was the Maa , Nirupa Roy. 
As expected, it was brilliant.
